oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Adhami, Fouad, 1935-2015. Bouncing on Demand
Lebanese painters
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Liar on demand: Social, critical, humoristic and lyrical play. Starring Antoine Kerbage. Music by Ziad Rahbani and Faysal al-Masri. Directed by Zohrab Yacoubian.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Liar on Demand
